tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had an amazing experience at Dr. Laud's clinic. The clinic is modern and hygienic, with parking available :-). The treatment itself was great. Dr. Laud was conservative in his approach and spent time discussing various crown and approach options with their pros and cons. He also spent a lot of time making sure my tooth was well-prepared to take an impression for the crown.

He even returned the first crown that came from the lab because he was not satisfied with the fit. He took great pains to ensure that the crown was the right one and the perfect fit. I received regular follow-up messages checking on my health.

In this age where doctors don't have time and sometimes run conveyor belt clinics, Dr. Laud's attention to detail and care was very refreshing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was struck by a dental emergency only few weeks after relocating from Delhi to Mumbai and, in the middle of the Covid 19 situation, finding a reliable dentist made me quite apprehensive. 
However, someone recommended Dr Laud and from the moment I walked through his clinic door there was no looking back.  
From all the preventive measures taken at the clinic, to a friendly, comforting approach, very thorough assessment, professional treatment and modern, state-of-the-art facilities, it was a great, all-in-one experience indeed.
I am so appreciative of the time and attention Dr Laud and his team have given to every detail of work required in my case and, it goes without saying, that I would wholeheartedly recommend him to anyone requiring professional, caring dental assistance.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

review: Dr Laud did a great job at extracting the tooth.  He did it in under 10 minutes and i did not feel any pain.  The post-operative healing was also very quick and i did not fell any discomfort even after the surgery.  Dr Laud is accessible and had the courtesy of checking on me the next morning.  Doctors rarely do that these days. Would recommend him strongly.

review: Dr Laud is a friendly person. While extracting my tooth he kept me in the loop and explained what he was doing. His hand at removing the tooth was excellent. I hardly had any pain and in ten minutes my wisdom tooth was out. I had no post surgery problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The attending doctors always gave me a very patient hearing and addressed my complaints (associated with a new set of full dentures) efficiently and without rushing me. They reminded me that I could always come in for a check or if any discomforts arose. 
The care and professionalism I experienced were really noteworthy. 
I was recommended to Dr. Laud and his team by friends - and I shall do the same to my other friends.
Overall, I was very satisfied - but the treatment isn't over yet, and I am sure I will receive the same high quality care in the weeks to come.
